features.name: view_snippet
features.description: Allows the user to see snippets of the text that include the search term

features.name: remove_users
features.description: Allows the user to remove other users

features.name: add_or_edit_users
features.description: Allows the user to add or edit other users

features.name: get_users
features.description: Allows the user to view a list of users in the group, including name, email, and privileges

features.name: view_abstract
features.description: Allows the user to see an abstract if one is provided

features.name: view_book_description
features.description: Allows the user to see a description of the book the chapter comes from if one is provided

features.name: print_pdf
features.description: Allows the user to print a copy of the PDF

features.name: download_pdf
features.description: Allows the user to download a copy of the PDF

features.name: approve_requests
features.description: Allows the user to approve requests for media access

features.name: deny_requests
features.description: Allows the user to deny requests for media access

features.name: bulk_approve
features.description: Allows the user to approve entire disciplines or journals

features.name: undo_bulk_approve
features.description: Allows the user to undo an existing bulk approval

features.name: get_facilities
features.description: Allows the user to view a list of facilities where students can access JSTOR

features.name: edit_facilities
features.description: Allows the user to edit the features that are enabled at facilities
